node.name: initializationText
node.value:
Would you like to read FBReader's daily tips? New tips would be downloaded from the FBReader site, with expected network traffic 1-2 kilobytes per week.
Enable tips?

node.name: message1
node.value: البرنامج يشغل كامل الشاشة بشكل افتراضي. اضغط في منتصف الشاشة لإظهار أزرار التحكم. يمكنك تغيير هذا الوضع من قائمة “المظهر” في نافذة الإعدادات.

node.name: message2
node.value: Well done! Now tap the centre third of the screen again to hide the controls and this hint. If you want to keep controls on the screen while reading, select the “Show action bar” option in “Appearance” in Settings.
